related_post.text: can someone tell me what I\'m doing wrong here? ```gopackage mainimport ( fmt" math")func main() { basePrice := 29.99 qty := 50.0 numberOfPayments := 12.0 totalPurchase := basePrice  qty monthlyPayments := math.Floor((basePriceqty)/numberOfPayments100) / 100 totalPay := monthlyPayments  numberOfPayments autopayCredit := totalPurchase  totalPay fmt.Println(totalPurchase) fmt.Println(monthlyPayments) fmt.Println(totalPay) fmt.Println(autopayCredit)}```
